languages.text: {n}Сенешаль багровеет.{/n} "Собственных детей — да в полон ереси... своими руками потомков своих топит в скверне!"
{n}Abelard's face turns a deep red.{/n} "To cast your own children into the thrall of heresy... To drown your progeny in this filth with your own hands!"
languages.original_text: {n}Сенешаль багровеет.{/n} "Собственных детей — да в полон ереси... своими руками потомков своих топит в скверне!"

languages.text: {n}Abelards Gesicht verfärbt sich tiefrot.{/n} "Die eigenen Kinder in die Knechtschaft der Ketzerei geben ... Eure Nachfahren eigenhändig in diesem Schmutz ertränken!"
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's face turns a deep red.{/n} "To cast your own children into the thrall of heresy... To drown your progeny in this filth with your own hands!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelards Gesicht verfärbt sich tiefrot.{/n} "Die eigenen Kinder in die Knechtschaft der Ketzerei geben ... Eure Nachfahren eigenhändig in diesem Schmutz ertränken!"

languages.text: {n}Abélard s'empourpre.{/n} « Laisser ses propres enfants tomber sous l'emprise de l'hérésie... Noyer sa descendance dans cette pourriture de ses propres mains ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's face turns a deep red.{/n} "To cast your own children into the thrall of heresy... To drown your progeny in this filth with your own hands!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard s'empourpre.{/n} « Laisser ses propres enfants tomber sous l'emprise de l'hérésie... Noyer sa descendance dans cette pourriture de ses propres mains ! »

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德涨红了脸。{/n}“这个人居然将自己的子孙后代丢入异端邪说的漩涡……亲手将自己的后人淹没在这污秽之中！”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's face turns a deep red.{/n} "To cast your own children into the thrall of heresy... To drown your progeny in this filth with your own hands!"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德涨红了脸。{/n}“这个人居然将自己的子孙后代丢入异端邪说的漩涡……亲手将自己的后人淹没在这污秽之中！”

languages.text: {n}アベラルドの顔が濃赤色に変わる。{/n}「自らの子を異端のスロールに投げ込むとは…自らの手で我が子を不浄で溺れさせるとは！」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's face turns a deep red.{/n} "To cast your own children into the thrall of heresy... To drown your progeny in this filth with your own hands!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドの顔が濃赤色に変わる。{/n}「自らの子を異端のスロールに投げ込むとは…自らの手で我が子を不浄で溺れさせるとは！」

languages.text: {n}La cara de Abelard se pone de un rojo intenso.{/n} «Permitir que sus hijos sigan el camino de la herejía... ¡Ahogar a su progenie en esta basura con sus propias manos!».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's face turns a deep red.{/n} "To cast your own children into the thrall of heresy... To drown your progeny in this filth with your own hands!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La cara de Abelard se pone de un rojo intenso.{/n} «Permitir que sus hijos sigan el camino de la herejía... ¡Ahogar a su progenie en esta basura con sus propias manos!».

languages.text: {n}Abelard'ın yüzü kıpkırmızı oluyor.{/n} "Kendi çocuklarını kâfirliğe sürüklüyorsun! Soyunu kendi ellerinle bu pislikte boğuyorsun!"
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's face turns a deep red.{/n} "To cast your own children into the thrall of heresy... To drown your progeny in this filth with your own hands!"
